layout.name: roll
layout.title: Does it roll?
layout.tooltip: If checked, the NPC will wait for a player to approach, then roll at them.

layout.name: patrol
layout.title: How long before turning?
layout.tooltip: Determines how long it will take for the NPC to turn around. Setting it to 0 will make it walk forever.

layout.name: speed
layout.title: Walk Speed
layout.tooltip: Determines the horizontal speed of the NPC.
